clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Apatinib Combined With S1 in Patients With Advanced Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Exploratory Study of Apatinib in Combination With S1 in Patients With Advanced Gastric Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety

brief_summary.textblock: Antiangiogenesis therapy plays an important role in cancer treatment. Apatinib showed good safety and efficacy as third-line therapy for advanced gastric cancer.We conducted this trial to investigate the safety and efficacy of apatinib combined with S1 after failure of first-line chemotherapy in advanced gastric cancer or gastroesophageal junction carcinoma patients.

primary_outcome.description: defined as the time from randomize to progression or death; RECIST guidelines were used to define all responses after patients had received every 6 weeks of therapy

secondary_outcome.description: defined as the time from randomize to death
as measured by the European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer questionnaire (EORTC QLQ C30)

arm_group.description: patients with advanced gastric cancer enrolled after failure of first-line systemic chemotherapy will be given Apatinib plus S1 till progressive disease,death or non-tolerable toxicity
